articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: China lashes back at NATO criticism, warns it will protect its rights - Reuters
articles.description: Beijing lashed back at NATO's accusation that China challenges the bloc's interests and security, and opposed any attempt by the military alliance to expand its footprint into the Asia-Pacific region.
articles.content: BEIJING, July 12 (Reuters) - Beijing lashed back at NATO's accusation that China challenges the bloc's interests and security, and opposed any attempt by the military alliance to expand its footprint… [+3456 chars]
